directions: Mix blue sports drink, sparkling water, wine, peach-flavored drink, energy drink, fruit candies, and vodka together in a punch bowl.
ingredients: 32 fluid ounces blue-colored sports drink (such as Gatorade®)
12 fluid ounces peach-flavored fruit drink (such as Snapple®)
1 (8.3 ounce) can citrus-flavored energy drink (such as Red Bull™)
1 (2.17 ounce) package fruit-flavored candies (such as Skittles®)
title: Swample Punch
